Belgium: Benedictine priory at Vorst, a dependency of Affligem Abbey, becomes the independent Forest Abbey.
Cambodia: Two Thai chieftains in the city of Sukhothai declared the establishment of the Sukhothai Kingdom and its independence from Angkorian dominion.
Estonia: The Livonian Order helps restore the power of the Bishop of Ã–sel Wiek in Kullamaa Parish.
India: Sri Madhwacharya born in Pajaka near Udupi, Karnataka
Poland: Death of Henry I the Bearded
Spain:
Ferdinand the Saint conquered Huelva and obtained the vassalage of Niebla, Andalusia.
James the Conqueror captured Valencia and created himself king of the Kingdom of Valencia.
